thread.section_title: Millenium Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel in the Financial District
thread.title_full: Nice hotel in the Financial District - Review of Millenium Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MaryfromMI
title: Nice hotel in the Financial District
text:
Nice place to stay. Subway is nearby. Location is okay depending on the purpose of your visit.
City view room allowed us to see the 911 Memorial and the new World Trade Center. Worth the upgrade!
Close to the Staten Island Ferry and the Brooklyn Bridge.
Would have preferred a location closer to Central Park but with the subway it worked out.
